property.name: logfeeder_dir
property.description: Location where logfeeder will be installed to. If download_location is set to RPM, logfeeder will be downloaded to /usr/hdp/_version_/logfeeder

property.name: logfeeder_download_location
property.description: Location to download logfeeder tarball from (e.g. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114020/logfeeder/logfeeder-portal.tar.gz)
